languages.text: "Каждый стартующий с поверхности грузовой челнок станет мишенью для атак бунтарей, которые не упустят возможности обрушить его пылающие останки на столицу. Хранилища могут стать объектами диверсий, провиант может быть отравлен или заминирован. Подобная логистическая операция может быть исполнена лишь тогда, когда восстание будет полностью подавлено".

"Any cargo shuttle that leaves the surface will be a target for attack — the rebels will not hesitate to bring it down, sending flaming debris over the capital. Our silos could become targets for sabotage — food could be poisoned or mined. The logistics of transporting supplies to Footfall will only be possible once the uprising has been completely crushed."
languages.original_text: "Каждый стартующий с поверхности грузовой челнок станет мишенью для атак бунтарей, которые не упустят возможности обрушить его пылающие останки на столицу. Хранилища могут стать объектами диверсий, провиант может быть отравлен или заминирован. Подобная логистическая операция может быть исполнена лишь тогда, когда восстание будет полностью подавлено".

Our silos could become targets for sabotage — food could be poisoned or mined. The logistics of transporting supplies to Footfall will only be possible once the uprising has been completely crushed."

"Any cargo shuttle that leaves the surface will be a target for attack — the rebels will not hesitate to bring it down, sending flaming debris over the capital. Our silos could become targets for sabotage — food could be poisoned or mined. The logistics of transporting supplies to Footfall will only be possible once the uprising has been completely crushed."

"Any cargo shuttle that leaves the surface will be a target for attack — the rebels will not hesitate to bring it down, sending flaming debris over the capital. Our silos could become targets for sabotage — food could be poisoned or mined. The logistics of transporting supplies to Footfall will only be possible once the uprising has been completely crushed."

Our silos could become targets for sabotage — food could be poisoned or mined. The logistics of transporting supplies to Footfall will only be possible once the uprising has been completely crushed."

languages.text: “任何离开这颗行星的货运飞船都会遭到袭击。叛军会毫不犹豫地将其击落，变成熊熊燃烧的碎片划过首都上空。储存食物的仓库也可能会成为破坏的目标。食物可能会被下毒，或是被直接销毁。只有彻底平定了叛乱之后，我们才有可能向落脚港运输物资。”
languages.original_text: "Any cargo shuttle that leaves the surface will be a target for attack — the rebels will not hesitate to bring it down, sending flaming debris over the capital. Our silos could become targets for sabotage — food could be poisoned or mined. The logistics of transporting supplies to Footfall will only be possible once the uprising has been completely crushed."

traits.locale_text: “任何离开这颗行星的货运飞船都会遭到袭击。叛军会毫不犹豫地将其击落，变成熊熊燃烧的碎片划过首都上空。储存食物的仓库也可能会成为破坏的目标。食物可能会被下毒，或是被直接销毁。只有彻底平定了叛乱之后，我们才有可能向落脚港运输物资。”

languages.text: «Toda lanzadera de carga que despegue de la superficie será objetivo de un ataque. Los rebeldes no dudarán en derribarla, haciendo caer restos ardientes sobre la capital. Nuestros silos son un objetivo excelente para el sabotaje, contaminando o minando la comida. Los desafíos logísticos del transporte de suministros a Paso solo serán viables una vez el alzamiento haya sido completamente aniquilado».
languages.original_text: "Any cargo shuttle that leaves the surface will be a target for attack — the rebels will not hesitate to bring it down, sending flaming debris over the capital. Our silos could become targets for sabotage — food could be poisoned or mined. The logistics of transporting supplies to Footfall will only be possible once the uprising has been completely crushed."

traits.locale_text: «Toda lanzadera de carga que despegue de la superficie será objetivo de un ataque. Los rebeldes no dudarán en derribarla, haciendo caer restos ardientes sobre la capital. Nuestros silos son un objetivo excelente para el sabotaje, contaminando o minando la comida. Los desafíos logísticos del transporte de suministros a Paso solo serán viables una vez el alzamiento haya sido completamente aniquilado».

languages.text: 「地表を出発するあらゆる貨物シャトルが攻撃対象です。反乱軍は燃えさかる破片を首都に降らせるためなら、シャトルを堕とすこともためらわないでしょう。サイロも妨害工作の対象となり得ます。食料に毒や爆発物が仕込まれる可能性もあります。フットフォールへ物資を輸送する流通計画は、反乱を完全に潰してからでなくては実現し得ないのです」
languages.original_text: "Any cargo shuttle that leaves the surface will be a target for attack — the rebels will not hesitate to bring it down, sending flaming debris over the capital. Our silos could become targets for sabotage — food could be poisoned or mined. The logistics of transporting supplies to Footfall will only be possible once the uprising has been completely crushed."

traits.locale_text: 「地表を出発するあらゆる貨物シャトルが攻撃対象です。反乱軍は燃えさかる破片を首都に降らせるためなら、シャトルを堕とすこともためらわないでしょう。サイロも妨害工作の対象となり得ます。食料に毒や爆発物が仕込まれる可能性もあります。フットフォールへ物資を輸送する流通計画は、反乱を完全に潰してからでなくては実現し得ないのです」

languages.text: "Jedes Fracht-Shuttle, das die Oberfläche verlässt, wird sofort Ziel eines Angriffs – die Rebellen werden nicht zögern, es abzuschießen, und wieder regnen brennende Trümmer auf die Hauptstadt herab. Unsere Silos können Ziele von Sabotage werden – Lebensmittel könnten vergiftet oder vermint werden. Die Transportlogistik von Vorräten nach Footfall wird erst möglich, wenn der Aufstand vollständig niedergeschlagen wurde."
languages.original_text: "Any cargo shuttle that leaves the surface will be a target for attack — the rebels will not hesitate to bring it down, sending flaming debris over the capital. Our silos could become targets for sabotage — food could be poisoned or mined. The logistics of transporting supplies to Footfall will only be possible once the uprising has been completely crushed."

traits.locale_text: "Jedes Fracht-Shuttle, das die Oberfläche verlässt, wird sofort Ziel eines Angriffs – die Rebellen werden nicht zögern, es abzuschießen, und wieder regnen brennende Trümmer auf die Hauptstadt herab. Unsere Silos können Ziele von Sabotage werden – Lebensmittel könnten vergiftet oder vermint werden. Die Transportlogistik von Vorräten nach Footfall wird erst möglich, wenn der Aufstand vollständig niedergeschlagen wurde."

languages.text: « Les rebelles n'hésiteront pas à abattre toute navette de transport quittant la planète et ses débris enflammés tomberont sur la capitale. Ils risquent également de saboter nos silos, en les piégeant ou en empoisonnant la nourriture. Le ravitaillement de Castel ne sera possible qu'une fois que les soulèvements auront été complètement écrasés. »
languages.original_text: "Any cargo shuttle that leaves the surface will be a target for attack — the rebels will not hesitate to bring it down, sending flaming debris over the capital. Our silos could become targets for sabotage — food could be poisoned or mined. The logistics of transporting supplies to Footfall will only be possible once the uprising has been completely crushed."

traits.locale_text: « Les rebelles n'hésiteront pas à abattre toute navette de transport quittant la planète et ses débris enflammés tomberont sur la capitale. Ils risquent également de saboter nos silos, en les piégeant ou en empoisonnant la nourriture. Le ravitaillement de Castel ne sera possible qu'une fois que les soulèvements auront été complètement écrasés. »

languages.text: "Havalanacak kargo mekikleri saldırıya açık. İsyancılar düşürmekten çekinmez, başkentin üzerine alev alev enkaz yağar. Silolarımız suistimale kurban gidebilir, yiyecekler zehirlenebilir veya bomba yerleştirilebilir. Binliman'a erzak taşıma planları ancak ayaklanma tamamen bastırıldıktan sonra mümkün."
languages.original_text: "Any cargo shuttle that leaves the surface will be a target for attack — the rebels will not hesitate to bring it down, sending flaming debris over the capital. Our silos could become targets for sabotage — food could be poisoned or mined. The logistics of transporting supplies to Footfall will only be possible once the uprising has been completely crushed."

traits.locale_text: "Havalanacak kargo mekikleri saldırıya açık. İsyancılar düşürmekten çekinmez, başkentin üzerine alev alev enkaz yağar. Silolarımız suistimale kurban gidebilir, yiyecekler zehirlenebilir veya bomba yerleştirilebilir. Binliman'a erzak taşıma planları ancak ayaklanma tamamen bastırıldıktan sonra gerçekleştirilebilir."
